channel.title: I need some help with a "few" questions! Please read!LOOK!
channel.description:
Hi! my first question is when i wear certain items like a necklace it goes to the weapon slot so now i cant use a weapon. How do i make it work?
My second question is how to add silabs items and stuff i got the the client but it wont open, I just need to know everything im supposed to do and have and edit. I just barely found out that they got new items and need help adding them. Remember I just barely found out about the items !
My third question is how to make gates and doors work. They don't work.
You can answer all or any of my questions just help me please! I know your thinking im a noob and stuff, but just help please!!
Thanks!

item.title: I need some help with a "few" questions! Please read!LOOK!

item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

If it’s too confusing,perhaps you should have a server with Silabsoft’s items already fixed?

item.title: I need some help with a "few" questions! Please read!LOOK!
item.dc:creator: @o0_v_1_n_o0 o0 v 1 n o0
item.description:
@o0_v_1_n_o0 wrote:

1st question:Go to Item.java and add the id’s of the item in the correct place for example:Id of Gold necklace in the amulet section

2nd question: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,204094.0.html

3rd question:Search section,use it.

Hope that helped!

Read full topic
